author: bmanikm
body:
Made changes to provide proper error message when an user is trying to install a module/script as non-root user.
#2286

comments.body:

comments.author: kilasuit
comments.body:
As PowerShellGet is now open sourced (and in its own repository) you should be making the change there and not in here
I've raised PR #2405 to decouple the module from this repository

title: Made changes to provide proper error message when an user is trying to install a module/script as non-root user.
